revised_title: Meteor Impact on the "Seven Stones" Light-Ship
tldr: A meteor struck the "Seven Stones" light-ship, leaving the watch momentarily unconscious and covering the deck with cinders. The event was reported to the Corporation of the Trinity House, who shared the account with the Royal Society. The Elder Brethren expressed doubt about obtaining a more accurate account of the phenomenon but offered to assist with further scientific inquiry if needed.
